title: Test plane with table part - d

content.description: A test plane flies in a straight line with positive velocity v(t), in miles per minute at time t minutes, where v is a differentiable function of t. Selected values of v(t) for 0 ≤ t ≤ 40 are shown in the table above.
content.question: According to the model f, given in part (c), what is the average velocity of the plane, in miles per minute, over the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 40 ?

frqParts.text: According to the model f, given in part (c), what is the average velocity of the plane, in miles per minute, over the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 40 ?

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
